Class Generator

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.util.ToolBase
      org.apache.nutch.crawl.Generator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable, Tool
public class Generator
extends ToolBase

Generates a subset of a crawl db to fetch.
